# 16-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors

**API Collection**

Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 16-bit integer elements.

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_ushort1**: A vector of one 16-bit unsigned integer element.
- **simd_ushort2**: A vector of two 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort3**: A vector of three 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort4**: A vector of four 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort8**: A vector of eight 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort16**: A vector of sixteen 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort32**: A vector of thirty-two 16-bit unsigned integer elements.

## Packed Vector Data Types

- **simd_packed_ushort2**: A packed vector of two 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_ushort4**: A packed vector of four 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_ushort8**: A packed vector of eight 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_ushort16**: A packed vector of sixteen 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_ushort32**: A packed vector of thirty-two 16-bit unsigned integer elements.

## Unsigned Integer Vectors

- **8-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 8-bit integer elements.
- **32-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 32-bit integer elements.
- **64-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 64-bit integer elements.
